mapper.select: SELECT M.IDX , M.TEXT , M.LIKES , M.IN_USER_ID , M.IMG , IFNULL(D.USERLIKED, 'FALSE') AS USERLIKED , IFNULL(D.COUNT, 0) AS COUNT FROM APP_INSTAR_M M LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_INSTAR_D D ON M.IDX = D.IDX;
SELECT IDX , IN_USER_ID , SUM(COUNT) AS LIKES FROM APP_INSTAR_D D WHERE IDX = #{idx} GROUP BY IDX, IN_USER_ID;
